name: Shooter on rails
description:
Did this with the help of Udemy instructor Ben Tristem and his team. Not a big fan of rail shooters so didn't work on it a whole lot, just enough to help me learn new things. Still turned out decent. Give it a try and enjoy!

Controllers:

A = Moves ship to the left

D = Moves ship to the right

W = Moves ship up

S = Moves ship down

Space or Mouse left click = Shoots bullets

Enter = Restarts Level
